EmployeeView = React.createClass({ propTypes: { // This component gets the employee to display through a React prop. // We can use propTypes to indicate it is required employee: React.PropTypes.object.isRequired }, handleChange: function(event) { var originalValue = this.props.employee.name.first; var inputValue = event.target.value; var inputName = event.target.name; if (originalValue != inputValue){ Employees.update(this.props.employee._id, { $set:{ "name.first" : inputValue, "name.last" : inputValue}, }); } }, render() { return (
); } });
